[File: aptos-core/crates/indexer/src/schema.rs] [Table: signatures] [Multi-sig Index Overflow] Can multi_sig_index (Int8) overflow in transactions with many signatures? (Low)

[File: aptos-core/crates/indexer/src/schema.rs] [Table: table_items] [Key Unbounded Length] The key field is Text with no length limit - can excessively long keys cause database performance degradation? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/crates/indexer/src/schema.rs] [Table: table_items] [Decoded Value Consistency] Can decoded_value (Nullable Jsonb) be NULL when actual on-chain data exists, hiding table content? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/crates/indexer/src/schema.rs] [Table: table_items] [Historical Deletion Tracking] Does is_deleted properly track deletion history across transaction versions, or can deletions be lost? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/crates/indexer/src/schema.rs] [Table: table_metadatas] [Type Mismatch] Can key_type and value_type be inconsistent with actual table operations, causing deserialization errors? (Medium)
